titleInfo.title: Letter, J.M. Kennedy and S.G. Bowman in Knoxville, Tenn., to M.B.C. Ramsey in Knoxville, Tenn. 1884 May 1

mods.abstract: 1884 May 1 J.M. Kennedy, President of the Knox County Medical Society and S.G. Bowman, Secretary of the Knox County Medical Society, to M.B.C. Ramsey, Knoxville, Tenn. Resolutions adopted by the Knox County Medical Society honoring the memory of J.G.M. Mentions some of his specific accomplishments in medicine, including helping to found the Society.

subject.topic: Physicians -- Tennessee -- Knox County -- History -- 19th century
Ramsey, J. G. M. (James Gettys McGready), 1797-1884 -- Death and burial
Ramsey, J. G. M. (James Gettys McGready), 1797-1884 -- Appreciation
